DOC.HEADLINE: CONCERT WILL BENEFIT THE DANCE COLLECTIVE
DOC.TEXT: The Dance Collective in Leimert Park is presenting " Htheru Dance and Music Celebration , " a spring showcase that will benefit the studio ' s community dance programs , today at 2:30 p.m. The program will include performances by the Jazzantiqua Dance Ensemble and the West_African ensemble Le Ballet de Kouman Kele . The Dance Collective is at 4327 Degnan Blvd . General admission is $ 10 , $ 5 for senior_citizens and children under 12 . Information : ( 213 ) 292-1538 .
